trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>事件時的頁面巡覽區按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 頁面 」) 控制項內按一下時前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項負責的分頁作業。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消分頁作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 頁面巡覽區按鈕通常位於中的頁面巡覽區列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: A GridViewPageEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate that the paging operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: GridViewPageEventArgs 物件會傳遞給事件處理方法，後者則可讓您判斷使用者所選頁面的索引，並指出應該取消的分頁作業。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the paging operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the GridViewPageEventArgs object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消的分頁作業，請設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>GridViewPageEventArgs 物件屬性`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of GridViewPageEventArgs, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 GridViewPageEventArgs 的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>的新執行個體

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>|The value of the `newPageIndex` parameter.| > [!NOTE] > This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |初始值 | |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>|值`newPageIndex`參數。 | > [!NOTE] > 主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式時引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the new page to display.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示新的頁面索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the new page to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示在新的頁面索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> event occurs before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control performs the paging operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property of the control cannot be used to determine the index of the page selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>事件發生之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>分頁作業，控制項執行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>控制項的屬性不能用來判斷使用者所選頁面的索引。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: Use the NewPageIndex property to determine the index of the page selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 使用 NewPageIndex 屬性來判斷使用者所選頁面的索引。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > During the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging> event, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> property still contains the index of the previously displayed page.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 期間<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A>屬性仍包含先前顯示的頁面的索引。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically override the page index selected by the user by setting it to another value.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個屬性，若要以程式設計方式覆寫使用者所選取設定為另一個值的頁面索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the new page to display in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示在新的頁面索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The NewPageIndex property is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 屬性是 NewPageIndex 小於零。
